      • TechnicApi

        public TechnicApi(java.lang.String apiUrl)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Read the API by it's URL.
        Parameters:
        apiUrl - API Url to the Modpack. Must be a http://api.technicpack.net/modpack/... Link
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - URL is unreachable
        java.net.MalformedURLException - URL is Malformed
